00099     public function authenticate( $mUserType = null )
00100     {
00101         if ( ! $this->m_oAuthModel )
00102             throw new CException( Yii::t( 'psYiiExtensions', '{class}::authModel must be set or {class}::authenticate() must be overridden.', array( '{class}' => get_class( $this ) ) ) );
00103 
00104         //  Attach our event handlers
00105         if ( ! $this->hasEventHandler( 'onLoginFailure' ) ) $this->attachEventHandler( 'onLoginFailure', array( $this, 'loginFailure' ) );
00106         if ( ! $this->hasEventHandler( 'onLoginSuccess' ) ) $this->attachEventHandler( 'onLoginSuccess', array( $this, 'loginSuccess' ) );
00107 
00108         $this->username = trim( strtolower( $this->username ) );
00109         if ( null !== $mUserType ) $this->m_mUserType = $mUserType;
00110 
00111         $_conditionList = array( $this->m_arAuthAttributes['username'] . ' = :' . $this->m_arAuthAttributes['username'] );
00112         $_parameterList = array( ':' . $this->m_arAuthAttributes['username'] => $this->username );
00113 
00114         if ( $this->m_bAllowEmailLogins && $this->m_arAuthAttributes['email'] )
00115         {
00116             $_conditionList[] = $this->m_arAuthAttributes['email'] . ' = :' . $this->m_arAuthAttributes['email'];
00117             $_parameterList[ ':' . $this->m_arAuthAttributes['email'] ] = $this->username;
00118         }
00119 
00120         if ( null === ( $_user = $this->m_oAuthModel->find( implode( ' OR ', $_conditionList ), $_parameterList ) ) )
00121             $this->errorCode = self::ERROR_USERNAME_INVALID;
00122         else
00123         {
00124             //  Get our event
00125             $_event = new CPSAuthenticationEvent( $this, $_user, $this );
00126 
00127             if ( $this->password !== $_user->getAttribute( $this->m_arAuthAttributes['password'] ) )
00128             {
00129                 $this->errorCode = self::ERROR_PASSWORD_INVALID;
00130                 $this->onLoginFailure( $_event );
00131             }
00132             else
00133             {
00134                 $this->errorCode = self::ERROR_NONE;
00135                 $this->setId( $_user->id );
00136                 $this->setUserType( $_user->user_type_code );
00137                 $this->onLoginSuccess( $_event );
00138             }
00139         }
00140 
00141         return ! $this->errorCode;
00142     }

00153     public static function authenticatePassword( $arOptions = array(), $sClassName = __CLASS__ )
00154     {
00155         $_bResult = false;
00156         $_sUser = PS::o( $arOptions, 'userName' );
00157         $_sPass = PS::o( $arOptions, 'password' );
00158         $_oFormModel = PS::o( $arOptions, 'formModel' );
00159 
00160         $_oIdent = new $sClassName( $_sUser, $_sPass );
00161         $_oIdent->setAuthModel( PS::o( $arOptions, 'authModel' ) );
00162         $_oIdent->authenticate();
00163 
00164         switch ( $_oIdent->errorCode )
00165         {
00166             case self::ERROR_NONE:
00167                 $_iDuration = PS::o( $arOptions, 'rememberMe', false ) ? 3600 * 24 * 30 : 0;
00168                 Yii::app()->user->login( $_oIdent, $_iDuration );
00169                 $_bResult = true;
00170                 break;
00171 
00172             default:
00173                 if ( $_oFormModel ) $_oFormModel->addError( 'form', 'User name or password is incorrect.' );
00174                 break;
00175         }
00176 
00177         return $_bResult;
00178     }
